headline: Exxon Mobil, Altria, and Other Defensive Dividend Stocks for a Rocky Market
summary: President Donald Trump’s threats over Greenland are rattling the stock market.  Fears of new political tension over the White House’s aggressive foreign policy and his demands to buy Greenland sent the  down 2% on Tuesday.  For stock market investors—who were already worried about a shaky U.S. economy and runaway artificial-intelligence spending—it’s yet another red flag.

headline: Why The Narrative Around Costco Wholesale (COST) Is Shifting After New Fair Value And 2026 Updates
summary: Why Costco’s Fair Value Was Trimmed The recent trim in Costco Wholesale’s fair value estimate from about US$1,055.97 to roughly US$1,030.19 reflects analysts balancing upbeat member traffic and value focused shopping trends with more cautious assumptions for revenue growth and broader retail conditions in 2026. A slight shift in the discount rate and a marginal adjustment to long term revenue growth expectations line up with Street research that sees Costco as well positioned on value, yet...

headline: Supreme Court Tariff Ruling Stakes Rise On Greenland Gambit
summary: The Supreme Court ruling as to whether President Donald Trump exceeded his authority in imposing tariffs under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) could come at any time, and the stakes just got bigger over the weekend.  Trump appears to be relying on the same authority in threatening to hit eight European nations with more tariffs unless Denmark lets the U.S. acquire Greenland.  S&P 500 futures are selling off Tuesday morning and the 10-year Treasury yield climbing in response to this internal NATO clash, as Europe signals that it won't cave to Trump's demands.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Costco Wholesale (COST) After Strong Multi Year Share Gains
summary: If you have ever looked at Costco Wholesale and wondered whether the current share price still makes sense, this article walks through what the numbers say about value.
